body.name: Electric Spin Scrubber, Cordless Voice Prompt Cleaning Brush with 9 Replaceable Brush Heads, 3 Adjustable Speeds Shower Scrubber with Extension Long Handle for Bathroom Floor Tile
features: 【The Trouble with Household Cleaning】🏡Bending over to clean the bathtub,suffering in your back and knees ；🏡Spend a lot of time cleaning the bathroom each week;🏡struggle with hard-to-clean stubborn stains, cement slurry on the floor;🏡Difficult to clean the ceiling, the glass above the windows;🏡Waste thousands of dollars a year on various cleaning products;The Homiiyar electric spin scrubber can help you solve all your problems!!

👍【Detachable & 3 Adjustable Size Mop】 The power scrubber helps you get rid of laborious household cleaning. newly upgraded with exclusive detachable design,put the telescopic extension rod on and it will allow you to adjust the length of the spin scrubber from 11.5in, 41.5in and 48.5in. Work great for hard-to-reach spots without kneeling , bending over or up to a ladder .Saving your back and knees by saying goodbye to the traditional clean way

👍【Powerful & Cordless& Rechargeable 】The bathroom scrubber built-in rechargeable 3000mAh batteries,the latest USB-C fast charge technology and battery level display function, It can provide 100 minutes of long-term work after only 3 hours of fast charging,you never need to worry about running out of power any annoying cords.This electric spin scrubber not only eases your cleaning burden but also cuts your cleaning time in half.

👍【3 Adjustable Speed & High Efficient Clean】: The shower scrubber with upgraded motor system has 3 speeds: low speed - 280RPM, medium speed-350RPM,high speed - 450RPM. The default low speed gear is turned on, and press power botton to easily switch to high gear. The adjustable speed design allows you to choose the cleaning method that suits you at will, higher speed than others products on the market, making the house sparkle with ease

👍【9 Versatile Brush Heads &Widely Used】 electric spin scrubber includes 9 replaceable cleaning brushes for various scenarios,SS Cleaning Ball for ovens, stoves, sinks; Flat brush for surfaces like tile floor, wall, and pool; corner brush is great for cleaning grout, faucets, edges; cloth brush for wooden floor and furniture cleaning; the sponge is for the window. Moreover, you can even polish and wax your car with those heads.The bristles are of good quality and will not scratch tiles, glass and cars. You can use it with confidence.

👍【Digital Display & Voice Broadcast】Homiiyar power scrubber is equipped with an LED digital display of battery usage, rotation speed .What's more surprising is that the electric cleaning brush also has a voice broadcast function to remind you of the current operating status of the electric scrubber brush.

🎁Ideal Gift for Your Family: Featured with IPX6 waterproof electric cleaning brush is convenient and powerful, We provide a 90-day worry-free refund and a 2-Year extended warranty for free. Please feel free to contact us if you encounter any problems.,This spin scrubber will be the best gift you can give to your family.

✅ NOTE: 👉1,Please press the power button for 3s to start the electric spin scrubber,then press 5s to turn on /off the voice prompt; 👉2,This electric cleaning brush has a self-protection function, when using too much force to press,It will stop rotating, then you need to restart it; 👉3，Different scenarios use different cleaning brush heads, more effective cleaning, please refer to the picture, or please contact us; 👉4, The electric spin scrubber with charging protection function, it does not work while charging; 👉5，Spraying detergent on stains and then using an electric cleaning brush will make your house shine even more;

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use! All the parts are easy to put together and use
reviews.reviewText: This saves me much time in cleaning! I always feel that my back hurts when cleaning my tub, but this product saves my back this time!!! I don't have to use much energy in rubbing. The machine did it for me automatically and it work perfectly fine. I also use it to clean some of the corners and it is hard to adjust my arm. It really helped my life become easier!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Una ayuda extraordinaria
reviews.reviewText: Me encantó, tenía unas manchas en el piso de un baño y con el cepillo de brillo se le quitaronLimpio la última baldosa del baño sin ningún esfuerzo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use and cleans very precisely. The product is very sturdy and is made of good material. It cleans surfaces well and does not strain the arm or require too more arm force to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and useful
reviews.reviewText: This product has helped me already with cleaning the shower and tubs in our home. My knees and back are thanking me for purchasing this item! The speeds are great. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You're going to love it
reviews.reviewText: I'm still experimenting and trying the different brush heads. So far so good. knowing that I might overuse some brush heads, I wondered about getting replacement heads. I found this product: Leebein Electric Spin Scrubber Replacement Brush Heads, 7pcs Extra Brush Accessories Kit for Leebein 2022 New Cordless Cleaning Brush, Compatible with All Brands of ANS-8050 OEM Electric Scrubber. They looked very similar so I ordered them. And...they work perfectly! Exact duplicate of the brush heads that came with the Electric Spin Scrubber. YAY

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really disappointed with this especially after reading all the great reviews. First, mine didn’t come with the charging cord, once I bought one and charged it up, this thing is just terrible. Even fully charged there’s barely any power to it on the highest setting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better then expected!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, cleans even better then we expected. Cleaned our stained grout better then scrubbing by hand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2023
